text: Dughiar kamɨn, Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazim Hanani ghua Atrivim Asan gara, kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ ti ghaze, Sirian atrivim nɨn akurvaghamin gavgaviba iti, egha nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn itir puvatɨgha, uabɨn akurvaghasa an azangsɨghan aghua. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ uan apaniba ko Sirian Atrivimɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba abɨraghan iburagham.
